MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-NOV-2020 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:14am. Our team have investigated a blown fuse at the Greenacres substation and have now established a fault on our underground cable network. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:58am on Thursday 19th November 2020
